syntax_editor_macro.comments: This template creates the code necessary to access the RecordSetValue() function contained in the RecordSetValue script include.
syntax_editor_macro.name: RecordSetValue
syntax_editor_macro.text: var RecordSetValue = x_snc_devtools.RecordSetValue; RecordSetValue('sys_properties','99ca5ab55b1022001f80efe5f0f91a05','value',true); // set property 'sn_atf.runner.enabled' to true! That's always a good idea!
